attributes.action: Reinstate the dog dog licence to run along side the current microchip law
attributes.additional_details: Breeder details to be given for first licence. Discounts may be offered for neutered dogs & owners who have passed training schemes. Multiple dog households will require a licence for each dog. Dogs in rescue need to be registered but only need a licence once in a home. Licences expire annually & will need to be renewed. When a dog reaches end of life the licence office are to be notified. Alongside microchipping it should provide traceability, accountability & protect a dog for life.
attributes.background: DOTS LAW - Proven in countries around the world to help control back street breeding, dog theft & reduce cases of abuse & neglect. We believe it will also benefit animal charities & council shelters. Every dog will require a licence, working & assistance dogs will be exempt of a fee.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign these petitions instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/586583
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/571526
